channel.title: #141: A Saber Feedback update three months after acquisition
channel.description:
In April 2020, I acquired Saber Feedback, a small SaaS app, from its owner and founder.
In this episode I openly report on the challenges and successes I’ve had in the first three months of owning [Saber Feedback](https://saberfeedback.com/). And yes, I do reveal customer numbers, revenue, and traffic volume!
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/ae9536bb-d929-4f68-a9ac-53ea5677e05a?dark=false"></iframe>
[You can also listen to and download this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/141-a-saber-feedback-update-three-months-after-acquisition/).

item.title: #141: A Saber Feedback update three months after acquisition
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Thanks Stephen, I appreciate the feedback. Solo episodes like this one are by far the hardest to record!
